text: Marta Lipińska (born 14 May 1940) is a Polish actress. She appeared in more than 40 films and television shows since 1962. ==Selected filmography== * Katastrofa (1965) * Salto (1965) * Nad Niemnem (1986) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Polish film actresses Category:People from Boryslav Category:Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Republic people
title: Marta Lipińska
